titles.title: A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of a certain entry of warp knitting machines as free of certain duties.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6363)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/24/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to liquidate or reliquidate without imposing any duties, and refund any duties paid, on a certain entry of warp knitting machines.
